title: Pfizer Declares Second-Quarter 2025 Dividend | PFE Stock News
text:
- Pfizer (
PFE,Financial) declares a second-quarter 2025 cash dividend of $0.43 per share. - The dividend is set for payment on June 13, 2025, to shareholders recorded by the close of business on May 9, 2025.
- This marks the 346th consecutive quarterly dividend from Pfizer.
Pfizer Inc. (PFE) has announced the approval of a second-quarter dividend of $0.43 per share, as confirmed by its board of directors. This dividend will be paid on June 13, 2025, to all stockholders recorded by the end of business on May 9, 2025. This payment represents Pfizer's commitment to delivering value to its shareholders, marking the 346th consecutive quarterly dividend issued by the company.
Pfizer, a leader in pharmaceuticals and health care innovations, continues to drive forward with its mission to improve global health. The company, with a market cap of $127.27B and significant institutional ownership, remains focused on developing therapies that address some of the world's most challenging diseases. As part of its efforts, Pfizer collaborates with health care providers and communities to enhance access to affordable health care.
Shareholders and potential investors can follow further updates and announcements from Pfizer on their official website or through their social media channels.
